Configuring
Configuring / Preparing to use workflows / Defining workflows or printers that use a color mapping table
Defining workflows or printers that use a color mapping table
You can specify the color mapping table used to print jobs at the job level or at the printer level.
To specify the color mapping table for an individual job, set the Color mapping table job property to the file name of the color mapping table.
To specify the color mapping table that a printer uses for jobs that do not have a value for the Color mapping table job property, set the Color
mapping table printer property to the file name of the color mapping table.
Parent topic: Preparing to use workflows
1 of 1
